scriptures.content: <crossref let="a" cid="c64001001.1"/>The elder to the beloved Gaius, <crossref let="b" cid="c64001001.2"/>whom I love in truth.
Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.

For I rejoiced greatly when the brothersOr brothers and sisters. The plural Greek word adelphoi (translated "brothers") refers to siblings in a family. In New Testament usage, depending on the context, adelphoi may refer either to men or to both men and women who are siblings (brothers and sisters) in God's family, the church; also verses 5, 10 came and testified to your truth, as indeed you are walking in the truth.
I have no greater joy than to hear that <crossref let="d" cid="c64001004.1"/>my children are walking in the truth.
Beloved, it is a faithful thing you do in all your efforts for <crossref let="e" cid="c64001005.1"/>these brothers, <crossref let="f" cid="c64001005.2"/>strangers as they are,
who testified to your love before the church. You will do well to send them on their journey in a manner <crossref let="g" cid="c64001006.1"/>worthy of God.
For they have gone out for the sake of <crossref let="h" cid="c64001007.1"/>the name, <crossref let="i" cid="c64001007.2"/>accepting nothing from the Gentiles.
Therefore we ought to support people like these, that we may be fellow workers for the truth.
I have written something to the church, but Diotrephes, who likes to put himself first, does not acknowledge our authority.

So if I come, I will bring up what he is doing, talking wicked nonsense against us. And not content with that, he refuses to welcome the brothers, and also stops those who want to and puts them out of the church.

Beloved, <crossref let="j" cid="c64001011.1"/>do not imitate evil but imitate good. <crossref let="k" cid="c64001011.2"/>Whoever does good is from God; <crossref let="l" cid="c64001011.3"/>whoever does evil has not seen God.

Demetrius <crossref let="m" cid="c64001012.1"/>has received a good testimony from everyone, and from the truth itself. We also add our testimony, and <crossref let="n" cid="c64001012.2"/>you know that our testimony is true.
<crossref let="o" cid="c64001013.1"/>I had much to write to you, but I would rather not write with pen and ink.
I hope to see you soon, and we will talk face to face.
Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends, <crossref let="p" cid="c64001015.1"/>every one of them. <end-chapter/>
